info.title: Profee WaaS integration API
info.description:
Welcome to the Profee wallet-as-a-service API documentation.

Our API allow you to embed financial services into your product: enable your users to hold funds, manage cash flow, issue virtual card and make payments.

This documentation provides you with the following information divided into sections:

  • Authentication: procedure we use for verifying clients connecting to API; We use basic authorization, which works quite simple: just encode in base64 the following 'your login':'password' and put the result under authorization header.
  • Wallets: creation of user wallet, getting information about wallet state and upgrading to verified level that increases wallet available limits;
  • Payments: obtain information about available payment methods, checking availability and charges applied to specific payment, payment creation;
  • Cards: creation of virtual card for your user and obtaining card details, balance, transaction history, getting

list of tokenized cards issued in other banks available for user to make transfers.

This is a living document to be updated regularly with new functionality. To access our sandbox or address questions to our developers please contact: waasteam@profeelab.net

post.description: Get wallet actual balance, current limit, and wallet status
Create a wallet, contains all the necessary data for new wallet registration.
Get payment actual information and status
Creating a payment on a pre-placed order

Creating an order to make a payment.
Checks the possibility to process a payment: balances and limits, the availability of the wallet. Calculates commissions.
Get card data: name, status, currency. Wallet number which the card is linked to, and payment product ID

After funding a Profee wallet with a bank card, the card data is saved in the form of a token.
The token can be used for subsequent transactions to top up the wallet and withdrawals to the card.
The request allows you to get all tokens linked to the wallet
Get data on the latest card transactions
Get card details: pan, cvv, expireDate, card holder name
Get Profee card actual balance
Issue Profee card. The user can get one card only

currency.description: Currency represented in alpha codes ISO 4217

creatorWalletId.description: Wallet id of user, initiated payment

lifetimeMinutes.description: Payment lifetime. If lifetime is passed and payment is not complete, it will failed

redirectUrl.description: Redirect url to the Paysafecash payment panel

info.title: Profee WaaS integration API
info.description:
Welcome to the Profee wallet-as-a-service API documentation.

Our API allow you to embed financial services into your product: enable your users to hold funds, manage cash flow, issue virtual card and make payments.

This documentation provides you with the following information divided into sections:

  • Authentication: procedure we use for verifying clients connecting to API; We use basic authorization, which works quite simple: just encode in base64 the following 'your login':'password' and put the result under authorization header.
  • Wallets: creation of user wallet, getting information about wallet state and upgrading to verified level that increases wallet available limits;
  • Payments: obtain information about available payment methods, checking availability and charges applied to specific payment, payment creation;
  • Cards: creation of virtual card for your user and obtaining card details, balance, transaction history, getting

list of tokenized cards issued in other banks available for user to make transfers.

This is a living document to be updated regularly with new functionality. To access our sandbox or address questions to our developers please contact: waasteam@profeelab.net

tags.name: Payment
tags.description:
We provide the list of payments methods for registered users. For each payment method, we give you a unique methodId.

Payment methods are divided by types, provided in methodType.

    Method types:
  • Wallet to wallet - a payment between users and their wallets.
  • Wallet to partner - a payment from user's wallet to partner.
  • Paysafecash to wallet - a topping up user’s wallet via Paysafecash. Give the opportunity to up user’s wallet with cash.
  • Shift to card- a payment from user's wallet to card issued via Profee.
  • Shift to wallet - a payment from card issued via Profee to user's wallet.

Overview of steps:

tags.name: Wallet
tags.description:
We create a wallet for each User of our partner, which is the registration of users. It is the starting point for interacting with our service

We have several critical restrictions for registering clients creating wallets:

  • The User must be over 18 years old
  • Unique phone number
  • Unique email

Overview of steps:

tags.name: Card
tags.description:
Our service allows you to issue bank cards for users. We can issue virtual and plastic cards. We also have a partner who will deliver plastic cards. Check the list of countries supported for cards delivery.

We will provide you different `productId` in order to issue plastic and virtual card on stage and product environments.

Сard issuing is available only for verified users and users with level PLUS or PREMIUM. You can check it via request /get-wallet

Overview of steps:

post.description: Get current limit and wallet status.
Create a wallet to register your users in our system. Specify all the necessary data for new wallet registration.

To verify a User’s identity with Profee, we need to receive documentation:

  • A document to confirm the User’s identity.
  • A separate document to confirm the User’s place of residence
  • A selfie holding the document provided in the previous point
Get current information about payment and status.
Create a payment on a pre-placed payment order.

Create an order to make a payment for registered users.

It is the first step of making payment. Here we check the possibility to process a payment and calculate fees.

    When checking the possibility of making payments, we check:
  • balance of payment sender
  • daily and monthly limits of wallet
  • availability of another wallet for Wallet to wallet payment type

You can set up /to/amount for many payment methods and /from/amount. You should use only one of them: /to/amount OR /from/amount. This functionality makes it possible to calculate the missing amount by direct or reverse calculation, and we will do it ourselves.
Get general information about the issued card and its current status.

After funding a Profee wallet with a bank card, the card data is saved in the form of a token.
The token can be used for subsequent transactions to top up the wallet and withdrawals to the card.
The request allows you to get all tokens linked to the wallet
UNDER CONSTRUCTION: Get data on the latest card transactions

Get sensitive card details. We use the RSA algorithm to encrypt sensitive data in response. To operate request /get-card-details, you need to generate for us a public RSA key with 4096-bit size. Better to prepare at once two keys, one for stage and one for production.

We encrypt a few fields in response to the request: pan, CVV, expiry date. For decryption, you will need your private keys.

Get the current balance of the card and the amount of active holds.

For details: 

    balance - available balance
    authorizedBalance - total amount of active holds
Issue new Profee card.
